text: Pirogov () is a 1947 Soviet drama movie directed by Grigori Kozintsev.Красавица, икона стиля. Как сложилась судьба артистки Татьяны ПилецкойПирогов (1947) The movie is based on the life of Russian scientist and doctor Nikolay Ivanovich Pirogov (1810-1881). It stars Konstantin Skorobogatov, Vladimir Chestnokov, and Sergei Yarov. ==Actors== * Konstantin Skorobogatov - Pirogov * Vladimir Chestnokov - Ipatov * Sergei Yarov - Skulachenko * Aleksei Dikiy * Olga Lebzak - Vakulyna == References == ==Other websites== * Category:Soviet movies Category:1947 movies Category:Soviet drama movies
title: Pirogov (movie)
